summary: This bill, the Repeal Community Development Block Grants Act of 2025, proposes to abolish certain community development grants. It amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 by repealing Section 101 and sections 103 through 122 of title I. The amendments would take effect on October 1, 2025. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. McClintock and Mr. Weber of Texas, and referred to the Committee on Financial Services.
